FOUND IN: Pergola - An open garden feature with vertical rafters supporting a roof eaves over walking ways, usually partially enclosed by walls.
Spoon - Essential utensil used to eat soups, cereals, and desserts.
Vervet Monkey (Chlorocebus pygerythrus) - This monkey has a long, bushy tail that serves as an important balance while moving through trees.
Gentle - Mild in manner or character; kind and considerate.
Mini-moon (also known as a new moon)
Red beans and rice - A traditional Creole dish made of red kidney beans cooked with onion, celery, garlic, bell peppers, tomatoes, spices, and rice.
Tea - The Assam region is renowned for its high-quality tea production.
